content: When 2.2 is released, will we need to coordinate a hard cutover to zulip.com SSO urls for hosted accounts? Or will both zulipchat.com and zulip.com be active for a little while?
So, master gets deployed to zulip.com/zulipchat.com frequently; the 2.2 release has very little impact on Zulip Cloud.

I expect when we move to using subdomain.zulip.com rather than subdomain.zulipchat.com, we will do so in a way that just changes the redirect URLs, and old URLs will still work. We haven't completed the testing of our plan for that, which is why we haven't done the cutover yet.
:thumbs_up:
